main event: A USAF pilot reported a sighting of a single pale yellowish-white luminous object in the sky over Osborn, Ohio on 9 July 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as V-shaped and measured 500-600 feet wide., It was observed at an altitude of 2,000-2,500 feet., The sighting lasted only 1-2 seconds., There is a discrepancy regarding the position of the quarter moon at the time of the sighting., The report suggests possible explanations such as auroral streamers or searchlights.
sighted object: a pale yellowish-white luminous V-shaped object
